Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had a monster game with 32 points and nine assists.
Jalen Duren supplied 14 points and 12 rebounds.
Tim Hardaway Jr. added 26 points for Detroit.
Anfernee Simons had 36 points and nine assists for Portland.
Shaedon Sharpe had 20 points, eight assists and eight rebounds.
The Trail Blazers led by 22 points in the first half.
